title: Do you know who is in charge of maintaining the posted signs and string around the dunes on the north end of Wrightsville Beach?  In some places, the string between the signs is coming unattached and is starting to litter up the beach.  It seems like something we shouldn\'t touch, and the signs don\'t provide any contact information.  Any idea whom to contact?  Thanks!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=20298
